semantic_description: Add OpenTelemetry RabbitMQ instrumentation to the clm-web service so that RabbitMQ spans with key messaging attributes appear in Jaeger traces.

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.destination
attributes_to_add.value_source: the queue name variable used when publishing

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.operation
attributes_to_add.value_source: the runtime value indicating the RabbitMQ operation (e.g., 'send' or 'receive')
